attributes.action: A 2nd Brexit vote if the NI Border situation isn’t resolved by the next deadline
attributes.background: This calls for a 2nd Brexit vote should the Government fail to reach a realistic and timely solution regarding the NI-ROI border by the Brexit deadline. (31st October 2019) Our Government must act in this way if they fail once more to get a workable deal through to the EU or through Parliament.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by a 2nd Brexit Vote.

If you would like a second referendum if a withdrawal agreement cannot be reached you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232984
